GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4.168 to before v5.4.227
GSD.description:
xen/netback: don't call kfree_skb() with interrupts disabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.227 by commit 50e1ab7e638f1009d953658af8f6b2d7813a7883, it was introduced in version v5.4.168 by commit 0d99b3c6bd39a0a023e972d8f912fd47698bbbb8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: xen/netback: don't call kfree_skb() with interrupts disabled
OSV.details:
